title: Mac Air A1466 2017 661-08140
message: I have Mac Air A1466 2017 661-08140 with liquid spill. Fan running high all the time, I believe sensor issue. 1) Can anyone help with the BV and schematic for this model ?

title: Mac Air A1466 2017 661-08140
message: It's an 820-00165 same as the 2015 board. Have you ruled out the trackpad, trackpad flex, I/O Board, I/O Cable, battery, and webcam as causes of the high fan speed? Run HWMonitor as well to see if any sensors report as bad.

title: Mac Air A1466 2017 661-08140
message:
Where was the liquid spill?
Usually trackpad issue; try known good board and flex.
Sometime caused by LIO board/flex.
On the MLB are various temp sensors too.
Depending which temps are reported with bad values in HWMonitor, you can make an idea about where to start...

title: Mac Air A1466 2017 661-08140
message:
[QUOTE="JohnB8812, post: 47340"]It's an 820-00165 same as the 2015 board. Have you ruled out the trackpad, trackpad flex, I/O Board, I/O Cable, battery, and webcam as causes of the high fan speed? Run HWMonitor as well to see if any sensors report as bad.[/QUOTE]

Thanks John, Yes I removed the board completly from the laptop and only the FAN , heat sink and the I/O board is connected. When I plug the adapter there is no light and the fan start spinning loud.

title: Mac Air A1466 2017 661-08140
message:
[QUOTE="2informaticos, post: 47343"]Where was the liquid spill?
Usually trackpad issue; try known good board and flex.
Sometime caused by LIO board/flex.
On the MLB are various temp sensors too.
Depending which temps are reported with bad values in HWMonitor, you can make an idea about where to start...[/QUOTE]

2informaticos the liquid was every where .. corrosion around the SMC , I/O cable need replacement , corrosion around U7600 , U5800 etc ... I cleaned the impacted area. This has few Proximity sensor and all look clean. Q5810, Q5830, Q5860 , Q5820 , Q5840 , Q5850 

The laptop will boot but very slow, fan is loud and no light on the adapter. I am going to order new I/O board .. but do you think this can cause the FAN issue / sensor issue ?

title: Mac Air A1466 2017 661-08140
message:
You had lot of sensors affected by corrosion; this is no good at all.
HWMonitor can help you, if shows strange temperatures.
But you must be sure of good contacts between MLB and LIO.
Check the flex and both connectors too.

title: Mac Air A1466 2017 661-08140
message: You have to have a good I/O board and cable as well as a known good trackpad and cable to measure sensors outside the housing otherwise fans will always go to max. My guess is liquid affected a sensor too, but you need known good parts first.

title: Mac Air A1466 2017 661-08140
message: Cleaned the board and replaced the I/O cable fixed the issue .. Thanks for the input !
